reason: Regulatory actions (Senate vote, state cease-and-desist orders) are creating immediate market uncertainty and potential volatility, warranting caution. However, strong underlying signals of institutional adoption (resilient exchange design, long-term trends) and significant real-world utility from high-net-worth investors (real estate purchases) indicate robust demand and long-term bullish sentiment. The market is likely consolidating, with smart money accumulating during periods of regulatory-induced price dips.
headlines: The Senate moves toward a market structure vote: State of Crypto
Tennessee orders Kalshi, Polymarket and Crypto.com to cease sports betting contracts

Institutions know a “good” exchange is built for failure
Hundreds of wealthy investors are using crypto to buy real estate in Europe
